divs: Sighting Detailsa white orb the size of a golf ball appeared to fall as a feather from a pasing hawk. It hoovered a second then slowly proceeded above the tree line
Summary: a white orb the size of a golf ball appeared to fall as a feather from a pasing hawk. It hoovered a second then slowly proceeded above the tree line
trends: There have been no other sightings in Rochester
This sighting has never been favorited.
